title: Written to remember
description: Sans Forgetica is a simple font designed to slow you down as you read, so ‘prompting your brain to engage in deeper processing.’

title: Suggested passages
description: With a built in library of suggested passages BibleTrainer has a set of verses to remember in many different situations.

title: Listen
description: Faith comes by hearing… listen to the passage as you read it, let the truth of God’s word sink into your heart.

title: Emoji
description: Some learn by reading, others are more visual. Enable emoji mode to add images to help you remember.
